subject: Fantasy Sports
Football
lead_paragraph: Among the unpredictable Colts, quarterback Andrew Luck is the best bet for fantasy owners this week, but receiver T.Y. Hilton cannot be recommended, with his recent struggles.
snippet: Among the unpredictable Colts, quarterback Andrew Luck is the best bet for fantasy owners this week, but receiver T.Y. Hilton cannot be recommended, with his recent struggles.
